liṅgasya dhartuḥ śārīra doṣa asparśaḥ api nityaśas
a dīkṣitaiḥ ca saṃsparśaḥ loke saṃbhāvyate khalu
vapana ādiṣu avaśataḥ nāpita sparśaḥ iṣyate
hīna varṇaiḥ api tathā caṇḍālaiḥ śvapacaiḥ api
liṅginaḥ sparśa saṃprāptau kīdṛśī niṣkṛtiḥ bhavet
etat sarvam samācakṣva loka anugraha tatpara
mahādevaḥ uvāca

original: vapanādau na liṅgasya muṇḍisparśo yathā bhavet |
analyzed: vapana ādau na liṅgasya muṇḍi sparśaḥ yathā bhavet
tathā prayatitavyam khalu anyathā niṣkṛtiḥ parā
liṅginaḥ nāpita sparśe śivasūtram visṛjya ca
punarnavam dhāryam eva brahmasūtram tathā eva ca
pañcākṣarīm ca gāyatrīm aṣṭottaraśatam japet
liṅgasya nāpita sparśe pavamāna ādi sūktakaiḥ
śrī rudreṇa ca kartavyam prokṣaṇam su viśeṣataḥ
caṇḍāla ādi jana sparśe sūtra yugmam apāsya ca
pavamāna ādibhiḥ prokṣya ca aṣṭottarasahasrakam

original: gāyatrīṃ mūlamantraṃ ca japtvā naktāśano bhavet || 21 ||
analyzed: gāyatrīm mūlamantram ca japtvā nakta aśanaḥ bhavet
a dīkṣitaiḥ savarṇaiḥ ca a savarṇaiḥ ca api saṃgatau
mūlam aṣṭottaraśatam japet tad doṣa śāntaye
devī uvāca
niṣkṛtiḥ kīdṛśī proktā kāla bhaṅga īrcanasya tu

original: āpatsu pūjālope ca tathā lope japasya ca ||
analyzed: āpatsu pūjā lope ca tathā lope japasya ca
alābhe patra puṣpāṇām niyatānām ca saṃkhyayā
mahādevaḥ uvāca
mūlam aṣṭottaraśatam kālabhaṅga īrcanasya tu
pūjāyāḥ ca japasya api lope mūlam sahasrakam
alābhe patra puṣpāṇām niyatānām su locane
ekaikasya japet eva mūlam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
devī uvāca
karāt pramāda vaśataḥ cyutam liṅgam adhas patet

original: tadā vai kiṃ nu karttavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vadasva me || 26 ||
analyzed: tadā vai kim nu karttavyam prāyaścittam vadasva me
mahādevaḥ uvāca
pramādena yadā liṅgam nija hastāt adhas patet
gṛhītvā tat tadā japyam mūlam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
anuktānām ca doṣāṇām nityam saṃbhāvita ātmanām
prāyaścitta tayā japyam mūlam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
devī uvāca
guru dattasya liṅgasya bhaṅgaḥ bhavet

original: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ tadā deva kṛpayā tannibodha me || 29 ||
analyzed: kim nu kāryam tadā deva kṛpayā tat nibodha me  /
mahādevaḥ uvāca
hanta te kathayāmi idam rahasyam api suvrate
dvi tri khaṇḍa tayā bhaṅge badhvā sarja rasena tu
kṛtvā tattva kalā nyāsam pūjayet aviśeṣatas

original: cūrṇībhāve tu liṅgasya cānyasmin tadgatāḥ kalāḥ |
analyzed: cūrṇībhāve tu liṅgasya ca anyasmin tad gatāḥ kalāḥ
āropya bibhṛyāt liṅgam punar labdham guroḥ karāt

original: atha liṅgasya lope tu kartavyaṃ śṛṇu sundari |
analyzed: atha liṅgasya lope tu kartavyam śṛṇu sundari
liṅgasya adarśane tyājyāḥ prāṇāḥ syuḥ bhakti yogataḥ
tu aśaktaḥ ced ekaviṃśat dina avadhi
nirāhāraḥ japan mūlam liṅgam anveṣayet janaiḥ

original: yadā vai labhate liṅgaṃ dhṛtvā bhaktyā tadaiva tat |
analyzed: yadā vai labhate liṅgam dhṛtvā bhaktyā tadā eva tat
gurum māheśvarān ca eva yathāśakti samarcayet
tadā api alābhe visṛjet asūn sat bhakti yogataḥ
prāṇatyāge tu aśaktaḥ ced liṅgam anyat guroḥ karāt
ākṛṣṭa pūrvaliṅgīya kalā nyāsa abhiśobhitam
bibhṛyāt apramādataḥ
devī uvāca

original: devadeva mahādeva dhṛte liṅge nave tataḥ |
analyzed: devadeva mahādeva dhṛte liṅge nave tatas

original: labhet cet pūrvaliṅgam kartavyaṃ kiṃ vadasva me || 37 ||
analyzed: labhet ced pūrva liṅgam kartavyam kim vadasva me  /
mahādevaḥ uvāca
pūrva liṅga upalambhe pi tyajet nā eva dhṛtam navam
yat tadīya kalāḥ sarvāḥ nave saṃveśitāḥ purā
tad pūrva liṅgam gurave vinivedya kṣipet jale
devī uvāca
naṣṭa liṅgaḥ tyajet prāṇān yadi deham tadīyakam
tat katham brūhi saṃskāryam anarham liṅga varjitam
yadi dhāryam liṅgam anyat prāṇatyāgaḥ nirarthakaḥ
ced adhāryam asaṃskāryam gātram tasya bhavet tadā
doṣaḥ tu ubhayathā dṛṣṭaḥ naṣṭa liṅgasya dehinaḥ
enam me saṃśayam chindhi karuṇā varuṇālaya
mahādevaḥ uvāca
tyaktāsoḥ naṣṭa liṅgasya tad kṣaṇe mokṣa saṃgatiḥ
na anarthaḥ tat asu tyāgaḥ saṃskāraḥ tu yathā śṛṇu
ākṛṣṭa naṣṭaliṅgīya kalā nyāsa yutam navam
liṅgam anyat su saṃyojya saṃskuryāt vidhinā tanum
saṃskāra artham punar liṅge yojite api śarīrake
tyaktāsoḥ nā eva lopaḥ asti yat ayam mokṣam āptavān
tat liṅgam prāṇa vat dhāryam apramādena sarvadā
